views.name: three_quarters
views.positive: Show this object in a clear three-quarters view angle with all features fully visible. Clean neutral background in solid contrasting color. Remove background clutter and watermarks. Preserve all object colors and textures accurately. Enhance edge sharpness and surface details. Ensure complete object visibility without cropping.

views.name: color_enhanced

views.name: detail_focused
